00015         GET(HouseClass *, pThis, ECX);

00017         // cache all super weapon statuses
00018         struct SWStatus {
00019                 bool Available;
00020                 bool PowerSourced;
00021         };
00022         SWStatus *Statuses = new SWStatus[pThis->Supers.Count];
00023         for(int i = 0; i < pThis->Supers.Count; ++i) {
00024                 Statuses[i].Available = false;
00025                 Statuses[i].PowerSourced = false;
00026         }
00027 
00028         // look at every sane building this player owns, if it is not defeated already.
00029         if(!pThis->Defeated) {
00030                 for(int idxBld = 0; idxBld < pThis->Buildings.Count; ++idxBld) {
00031                         BuildingClass * pBld = pThis->Buildings.GetItem(idxBld);
00032                         if(pBld->IsAlive && !pBld->InLimbo) {
00033 
00034                                 // the super weapon status update lambda.
00035                                 auto UpdateStatus = [=](int idxSW) {
00036                                         if(idxSW > -1) {
00037                                                 Statuses[idxSW].Available = true;
00038                                                 if(!Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced) {
00039                                                         TechnoExt::ExtData *pExt = TechnoExt::ExtMap.Find(pBld);
00040                                                         Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced = pBld->HasPower
00041                                                                 && pExt->IsOperated()
00042                                                                 && !pBld->IsUnderEMP();
00043                                                 }
00044                                         }
00045                                 };
00046 
00047                                 // check for upgrades. upgrades can give super weapons, too.
00048                                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00049                                         if(BuildingTypeClass *Upgrade = pBld->Upgrades[i]) {
00050                                                 UpdateStatus(Upgrade->SuperWeapon);
00051                                                 UpdateStatus(Upgrade->SuperWeapon2);
00052                                         }
00053                                 }
00054 
00055                                 // look for the main building.
00056                                 UpdateStatus(pBld->FirstActiveSWIdx());
00057                                 UpdateStatus(pBld->SecondActiveSWIdx());
00058                         }
00059                 }
00060         }
00061 
00062         // now update every super weapon that is valid.
00063         for(int idxSW = 0; idxSW < pThis->Supers.Count; ++idxSW) {
00064                 SuperClass *pSW = pThis->Supers[idxSW];
00065                 SuperWeaponTypeClass * pSWType = pSW->Type;
00066 
00067                 // if this weapon has not been granted there's no need to update
00068                 if(pSW->Granted) {
00069 
00070                         // is this a super weapon to be updated?
00071                         // sw is bound to a building and no single-shot => create goody otherwise
00072                         bool isCreateGoody = (!pSW->unknown_bool_60 || pSW->Quantity);
00073                         bool needsUpdate = !isCreateGoody || pThis->Defeated;
00074                         if(needsUpdate) {
00075 
00076                                 // super weapons of defeated players are removed.
00077                                 if(!pThis->Defeated) {
00078 
00079                                         // turn off super weapons that are disallowed.
00080                                         if(!Unsorted::SWAllowed) {
00081                                                 if(pSWType->DisableableFromShell) {
00082                                                         Statuses[idxSW].Available = false;
00083                                                 }
00084                                         }
00085 
00086                                         // there is at least one available and powered building,
00087                                         // but the house is generally on low power.
00088                                         if(pThis->PowerOutput < pThis->PowerDrain) {
00089                                                 Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced = false;
00090                                         }
00091                                 } else {
00092                                         // remove. owner is defeated.
00093                                         Statuses[idxSW].Available = false;
00094                                 }
00095 
00096                                 // shut down or power up super weapon and decide whether
00097                                 // a sidebar tab update is needed.
00098                                 bool update = false;
00099                                 if(!Statuses[idxSW].Available || pThis->Defeated) {
00100                                         update = (pSW->Lose() && HouseClass::Player);
00101                                 } else if(!Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced) {
00102                                         update = (pSW->IsPowered() && pSW->SetOnHold(true));
00103                                 } else {
00104                                         update = (Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced && pSW->SetOnHold(false));
00105                                 }
00106 
00107                                 // update only if needed.
00108                                 if(update) {
00109                                         // only the human player can see the sidebar.
00110                                         if(pThis == HouseClass::Player) {
00111                                                 if(Unsorted::CurrentSWType == idxSW) {
00112                                                         Unsorted::CurrentSWType = -1;
00113                                                 }
00114                                                 int idxTab = SidebarClass::GetObjectTabIdx(SuperClass::AbsID, pSWType->GetArrayIndex(), 0);
00115                                                 MouseClass::Instance->RepaintSidebar(idxTab);
00116                                         }
00117                                         pThis->ShouldRecheckTechTree = true;
00118                                 }
00119                         }
00120                 }
00121         }
00122 
00123         // clean up.
00124         delete [] Statuses;
00125         Statuses = NULL;
00126 
00127         return 0x50B1CA;
